Posts.Content: Nov 23, 2017 12:33AM Mariposa17 wrote: I had my SAVI device removed a month ago. My wound is not completely healed. During my follow up appointment the radiation doc said all looked well. But, I’m concerned that I’m not “closed up” yet. I see the breast doc next week and I’m afraid I’ll need to go to wound care. Has anyone had a long healing time. And, I have a big, itchy rash really right under the incision site...

Posts.Content: Nov 23, 2017 11:35PM Mariposa17 wrote: Thank you for the encouragement. I had stop using adhesive and now just use a sterile pad. Aloe and lavendar with coconut oil help ( not on the incision, just the rash). I'll let you know what the doc says after my visit next week
